DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy bimatoprost solution 0.03 % compare vehicle Japanese adult hypotrichosis eyelash .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Bimatoprost Japanese Patients With Eyelash Hypotrichosis
DOC.criteria: Have inadequate eyelash Any disease/infection/abnormality eye area around eye Any ocular surgery within 3 month anticipate need ocular surgery study Any permanent eyeliner implant kind anticipate use false eyelashes Any semipermanent eyelash tint , dye , curl eyelash extension application within 3 month Use overthecounter eyelash growth product within 6 month use prescription eyelash growth product Use treatment may affect hair growth ( eg , minoxidil , chemotherapy ) within 6 month
